snippet.textDisplay: And as of January 2013, Pandora's Tower is getting localized! People can say what they will of Operation Rainfall, but the pre-announcement picture XSEED floated around seems to suggest that Operational Rainfall was indeed a factor in deciding to bring the game west.
snippet.textOriginal: And as of January 2013, Pandora's Tower is getting localized! People can say what they will of Operation Rainfall, but the pre-announcement picture XSEED floated around seems to suggest that Operational Rainfall was indeed a factor in deciding to bring the game west.

snippet.textDisplay:
@TheBrotherIsSarge
How was operation rainfall pretentious and poorly-conceived? the supporters did everything right and were not annoying when fighting  for something they wanted, which Nintendo of America acknowledged in their address to this issue. besides if all three games were localized in Europe and two are on the way in America (i'm sure  Pandora's tower will be coming soon enough) i'd have  a tough time considering this amazing effort "poorly-conceived".

snippet.textDisplay: The thing that boggles my mind is that Nintendo will have press conferences acknowledging the Wii's slowing sales and the lack of good new software for the present and future, yet they have 3 solid games here that have a great amount of excitement around them, with no advertising, and they're just completely ignoring them, for no other reason than to apparently just be dicks.

snippet.textDisplay: @SupraDarky Sadly, the RPGs in this generation suck compared to the PS2, SNES, etc.  People want good graphics and FPS and companies want to bring MMORPG-like combat.  DS is definitely where it's at in terms of RPGs this generation though.  Mario and Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story is great the only problem I have with is that its music could be better, it is Yoko Shimomura (Kingdom Hearts) after all, but it all just sounds the same.
snippet.textOriginal: @SupraDarky Sadly, the RPGs in this generation suck compared to the PS2, SNES, etc.  People want good graphics and FPS and companies want to bring MMORPG-like combat.  DS is definitely where it's at in terms of RPGs this generation though.  Mario and Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story is great the only problem I have with is that its music could be better, it is Yoko Shimomura (Kingdom Hearts) after all, but it all just sounds the same.

snippet.textDisplay:
Operation Rainfall FTW! For those who haven't heard Operation Rainfall is a group dedicated to localizing Xenoblade, The Last Story, and Pandora's Tower to North America. We have over 8000 members so far and anyone interested can simply Google Operation Rainfall and see the website. 

If you are a North American and you want Xenoblade, please join!
snippet.textOriginal:
Operation Rainfall FTW! For those who haven't heard Operation Rainfall is a group dedicated to localizing Xenoblade, The Last Story, and Pandora's Tower to North America. We have over 8000 members so far and anyone interested can simply Google Operation Rainfall and see the website. 

If you are a North American and you want Xenoblade, please join!
